remarks: Value of the projective map of a Hilbert lattice at lattice unit.  Part of Theorem 15.5.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Oct-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pmap1.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
pmap1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmap1.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmap1N $p |- ( K e. OP -> ( M ` .1. ) = A ) $.
